/usr/bin/c++    -lGLESv2 -std=c++1z -lstdc++fs -lBulletDynamics -lBulletCollision -lLinearMath -g   CMakeFiles/DayLight.dir/src/Patronus/Mesh.cpp.o CMakeFiles/DayLight.dir/src/Patronus/Light.cpp.o CMakeFiles/DayLight.dir/src/Patronus/Shaper.cpp.o CMakeFiles/DayLight.dir/src/Patronus/Transformable.cpp.o CMakeFiles/DayLight.dir/src/Output/View_renderer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/DayLight.dir/src/Output/Renderer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/DayLight.dir/src/Utility/Config.cpp.o CMakeFiles/DayLight.dir/src/Utility/Color.cpp.o CMakeFiles/DayLight.dir/src/Utility/Utility.cpp.o CMakeFiles/DayLight.dir/src/Lumos/Countable.cpp.o CMakeFiles/DayLight.dir/src/Lumos/ArrayBuffer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/DayLight.dir/src/Lumos/Instance.cpp.o CMakeFiles/DayLight.dir/src/Lumos/Shader.cpp.o CMakeFiles/DayLight.dir/src/Lumos/Program.cpp.o CMakeFiles/DayLight.dir/src/Lumos/ModelAsset.cpp.o CMakeFiles/DayLight.dir/src/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/DayLight.dir/src/Internal/Face.cpp.o CMakeFiles/DayLight.dir/src/Internal/OpenGlOffscreenSurface.cpp.o CMakeFiles/DayLight.dir/src/Internal/btDebugDrawer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/DayLight.dir/src/Internal/PhysicalWorld.cpp.o CMakeFiles/DayLight.dir/src/Internal/Camera.cpp.o  -o DayLight -rdynamic /usr/local/lib/libopencv_shape.so.3.2.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_stitching.so.3.2.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_superres.so.3.2.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_videostab.so.3.2.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_viz.so.3.2.0 -lGLU -lGL -lSM -lICE -lX11 -lXext -lEGL -lGLEW -lglut -lXmu -lXi /usr/local/lib/libopencv_objdetect.so.3.2.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_calib3d.so.3.2.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_features2d.so.3.2.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_flann.so.3.2.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_highgui.so.3.2.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_ml.so.3.2.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_photo.so.3.2.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_video.so.3.2.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_videoio.so.3.2.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_imgcodecs.so.3.2.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_imgproc.so.3.2.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_core.so.3.2.0 -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib
